design_philosophy.core_concept: The Arena of Dust and Glory
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Cinematic, High Contrast, Rugged Textures

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major stats. MUST be Uppercase.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-20 or p-32 for section gaps. Mobile: p-8.
layout_strategies.grid_system: The 'Tetris' Grid. Avoid perfect symmetry. Use col-span-2 vs col-span-1 to create rhythm.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D12828] text-white hover:bg-red-700 uppercase font-bold tracking-widest skew-x-[-10deg] px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(209,40,40,0.6)]
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-[#F2C94C] hover:text-[#F2C94C] uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 bg-transparent transition-all duration-300

cards.experience: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:border-[#D12828]/50 transition-all duration-500 backdrop-blur-sm
cards.stat: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8 bg-gradient-to-br from-white/5 to-transparent border-t border-white/10

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-[#D12828] text-white placeholder-gray-500 rounded-none h-12

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI elements. Use 'react-icons/si' for brand logos if needed.

specific_instructions.hero_section: Must use the 'hero_bg' with a heavy gradient overlay (black to transparent). Text MUST be huge (text-7xl md:text-9xl) using 'Anton' font. Add a floating 'Scroll Down' indicator.
specific_instructions.stats_section: Use 'react-countup' or similar logic for numbers. Make numbers Gold (#F2C94C).
specific_instructions.booking_form: Use a Modal (Dialog) for the booking form. Do not put it directly on the page to save space. Trigger it via the Main CTA.
specific_instructions.navigation: Sticky glassmorphism header. Logo on left (Text: TRIBAL XPERIENCE in Anton). Nav links center. 'Book Now' button right.
specific_instructions.footer: Massive footer. 'TRIBAL' text spanning full width. Social links in Gold.
